message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could meet you halfway at $105.  It's a steal for the value you'll get.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
